entry.title: To Do - Revive Blog
entry.summary: Well it’s been just over 3 years since I launched this blog. In that time I wrote one post, yes, one post. That’s not good. I knew I wanted a static site. I went down the path, and got it all set up, but it just didn’t work for me. So the site sat idle. I also wasn’t happy with how it looked, and wanted something else. Lastly, I decided I didn’t need or want Bootstrap, so the search began.
